titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Kurt Richard Valentin Muller (1889-1945) was a professor of classical archaeology at Bryn Mawr College from 1931 to 1945. He specialized in ancient Greek archaeology and the Near Eastern influence on early Greece.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the professional and personal papers of Valentin Muller. Included are drafts and typescripts of papers, research notes and photographs of classical antiquities, and personal documents, including family photographs, Muller's diplomas, and school records from universities in Germany. The research notes and some of the articles are in German.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.
